title: Group portrait of Maude Jones, guest of honor, surrounded by gifts, and eighteen women, including Corrine Berry, Odessa Berry, Gloria Frazier, Dorothy Gardin, Helen Peay, Fannie Baugh, Sandra Kelsey, Peggy Westley, Gloria Davis, Louise Hinton, Althea Blair, Anitha Williams, Geneva Arter, Jean Sumpter, and Vera Boulden; standing: Ella Smart, Arthela Eberhardt and Elizabeth Diggs, posed in home of Elizabeth Diggs, Upland Street for baby shower, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
